name: CONiRUS
description:
WOW!!!!!!        FINALLY!!!!!!!           My First game!!!!!!!!

CONiRUS is my first game and it is a 2d endless runner game where  a CONiRE  is moving up and down to avoid obstacles of different kinds. there are different CONiRUS  which a player can choose from.  I hope you guys like it and please leave a comment when you play.

All background music are not original:

Night Adventure (trailer music - long version) by Agnese Valmaggia.   Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/6570-night-adventure-trailer-music-long-version-   License: https://creativecommons.org/license/by/4.0/
